articles.title: Mars rover mission suspended because of Ukraine war – here's what we're hoping for next - Jammu Kashmir Latest News | Tourism | Breaking News J&K - Top Stories

articles.title: US CDC publishes guidelines on monkeypox vaccine. Details here - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Jynneos vaccine, made by Bavarian Nordic, will be available for the recommended groups at a time when monkeypox infections are spreading in Europe, United States and beyond. | World News
